data: When the Cubans, led by Gomez and Maceo, were waging their final rebellion against the immemorial tyranny of Spain, it may be recalled that there was much filibustering out of American ports, and a lively demand for seafaring men of an intrepid temper who could be relied on to keep their eyes open and their mouths shut.
browsing: culture/civilization/society|browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: adventure|category: novels|category: american literature
